resource: 1001676.description=Toyota Financial Services College Graduate Program is available on approved credit through your participating Toyota dealer and Toyota Financial Services. Not all applicants will qualify. Rebate offered by Toyota Motor Sales, U.S.A., Inc. Rebate will be applied toward the down payment on the finance contract. One rebate per finance transaction. Not compatible with the Toyota Military Rebate Program. Rebate available on contracts executed through April 1, 2013. Only available on select new untitled Toyota models â€” Camry (excludes Hybrid model), Corolla, Matrix, RAV4, Tacoma, Yaris and Prius c vehicles. College Graduate Program is subject to change or termination at any time. Some restrictions apply. Program may not be available in all states. 1001676.derived=false 1001676.vtc=true 1001676.source=MANUAL_IMPORT
